column4: I am running Ubuntu 9.04 on a Dell Studio Slim 540s. I can't get a resolution of 1920 x 1200 which is native on my HP 2335 23" 16:10 monitor. Can someone tell me how to resolve this?
ThRixXx" I used the dell iso dvd which is supposed to do that.
open up a terminal from Applications/accessories terminal then type lspci in the terminal and it will tell you
hit enter after typing lspci and then it'll spit out a list of your hardware
so you have an intel based graphics chipset
it appears ThRixXx has this under control i'll just be here for moral support
when you go to System/Administration/Hardware drivers tell me what you get there
perhaps, but let's make sure you're using the right drivers first
can you send that info to me
take your time. i'll brb in 10 mins...
